name: I am Groot
description:
An adventure filled with rage and confusion. Narrated by Groot.

An exercise in the reduction of language to a single line repeated ad absurdum. It's quite short because otherwise it'd be bad times for everybody

Inspired by this NSFW fanfic : https://archiveofourown.org/works/2080878

I'm not sorry. Blame @kaydamphyr.

I don't own Groot. Groot is it's own plant owned by Marvel. So are other characters except Jeff.
